/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of red and white, stand out against the clear blue sky. The trees, with their bare branches reaching out, add a touch of serenity to the bustling cityscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the vibrant colors of the scene.
